title: League Wont open
body:
I need help, im using a mac and everytime i try to open league since the new update the little icon bobs then disappears. Ive tried deleting the lock file but it won't do it, and doesnt stay up long enough for me to try to delete it other times. Can anyone help? i've put too much time and money into this game for it not to work lol
Oh i should probably say the hextech repair tool isnt working either

replies.body: Hey, what version of your OS are you currently using?  I've seen a few issues like this, but I hear that updated your OS can fix things up!
Its completely updated, i did it yesterday in hopes that it would fix it but unfortunately I have the same problem.

Thanks for the update!  There might be another issue happening in this case, where a network instbaility or block is preventing access to the patching service.  I recommend the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities with that.  Let me know if it helps!
Okay so I now also know that my PBE wont open either so its got to do with the new update. please sort DX

I have the same issue, the game will work fine sometimes. But after I exit the game and try to come back and play later . I click the icon and it bounces for a second and then does nothing. Hextech repair tool does nothing for me either. I'm sure the game would work fine again if I reinstalled, but I've tried that and it lets me in sometimes and then the problem repeats. It feels like something about the new update has files that get corrupted upon exiting the game and trying to open it up again later, or at least for me.
Yeah i think its got something with the new update, i tried reinstalling it twice and nothing. Mine only started doing it when the new update came out a couple days ago
